titleStmt.title: The dissenters case. In relation to the bill of forfeitures, stated by way of objection and answer, and humbly offered to the favourable consideration of His Majesty, and both Houses of Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; date of publication from Wing.
Imperfect: creased with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
